data.name: Sam & Max 205: What's New Beelzebub?
data.detailed_description:
Judgment day is at hand, and it's time for a showdown with the guy downstairs to bargain for Bosco's soul. But in the corporate wasteland known as Hell, not even the Freelance Police are safe from eternal damnation. Can Sam & Max fight free from Satan's grasp, or have they reached the end of the line?
  • Exciting season finale
  • Memorable characters and thousands of lines of funny dialogue
  • Intuitive point and click gameplay
  • Unique built-in hint system tailored to the player's needs
  • Original jazz soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
• Supported OS: Microsoft Windows® XP or Vista
  • Processor: 1.5 MHz or higher
  • Memory: 256MB (required), 512MB (recommended)
  • Graphics: 32MB 3D-accelerated video card
  • DirectX Version: DirectX® 8.0 or higher
